text: How to enable "styles" tab in edit page for custom module section?.
this "styles" tab is not showing for the custom module

Would it be possible to make the column headers in Content Staging either adjustable by us for their width, or can you guys make them size more appropriately? There is a huge gap for a column before the Page Name that doesn’t need to exist, it’s difficult to see full template names and the Staged Date column is quite large when it seems like it should be the same size as the Updated Date column.
In addition, it’d be great if we could sort by any of the 4 columns rather than just Page Name and Updated Date. IE: Sort by Template to easily see all pages using the same template.
One of our team is reporting that the simple menu field isn't rendering properly in custom modules. She's using Chrome and has disabled all extensions. Anyone ever seen anything like this before?
Same in the page editor ui
